page.title: 16A STOTTESDON CHILD'S DAY
page.content: {My name is Suzy.}I am 10. I wake up at 6am. The cat jumps on me, and nibbles my toes. The next thing I do is make my bed. Mum makes breakfast. I have Cornflakes. Mrs Howells takes us to school in the taxi. I have sandwiches for lunch. My favourite sandwiches are egg and chives and salad cream. I go home the same way I came. I watch telly and then have tea. I go to bed and read, at about 9 o'clock. {My name is Richard.}I am 8. I wake up at 8 am. The cars wake me. I go and have breakfast, then I get dressed. I brush my teeth then I wash my face, and then I go to school. Jenny takes me in her car. I have school dinners. Jenny takes me home, or sometimes Mum walks to fetch me. I watch telly, then I have tea. Sometimes we have curry. Then I go to bed at 10 o'clock.
